history.content:
• 1) It's 4 units total a semester. This includes 197 and 198 (so DeCals). I think you can enroll in more than 4, but only 4 will count towards your degree. https://ls.berkeley.edu/courses-unit-limits
  • This cannot be petitioned. If you enroll in the honors program, you may complete an honors research thesis for a letter grade

Hi, 

I'm an LSCS junior doing research with two different professors right now. I was wondering if it's possible to max out units for EE/CS 198 with both of them next semester, so I'd have 8 units of research total (4 each). 

I was also wondering if it's possible to make exceptions to the P/NP rule for research units. I heard from a friend in a different department that taking research units for a letter grade is possible from some sort of petition. Is this true for EE/CS 198 as well? Thanks.
history.subject: Research Units Cap/Letter Grades?
